title: Spritz Restaurant and Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kitchen could make vegan cheese pizza with Daiya cheese (not listed on website). Also has a spritz veggie burger and fries, a vegetariana pizza with eggplant, zucchini and mushrooms, a mixed green salad. 2 minutes from Sandyport Beaches Resort.
streetAddress: Olde Towne Marina Plaza at Sandyport
